item.description:
Ciao amici, certo che ieri sera e andato benissimo alla casa di Janet! Mi dispiace che non protebbo andare. I got in late from a business trip.

Make sure to leave your comments on how the night went. I'm sure I missed out on a great time!

Donna Cosentino one of our amici's gave me a heads up on an Italian festivial taking place April 24-27th at Yale in New Haven. 3rd annual Italian Film Festival will be talking place at the Whitney Humanities Center in New Haven ( it is part of Yale)

It's FREE and you can attend on any day. I will attach the link below.

If we can get enough people for say Saturday, April 26th. I can e-mail ahead for seats. We can then get together after the viewing for some cappucino, cafe latte or tea.

Saturday, April 26, 2008 7.00 p.m
Casomai (If by chance) Alessandro D'Alatri, 2002 (114 min)
Introduction by the director, Alessandro D'Alatri, who will lead a Q&A after the screening
This romantic comedy is set in the slick world of advertising in Milan and playfully explores the lasting power of relationships.

http://www.yale.edu/i...

Let's try to RSVP to me by this coming Saturday, April 5th. I will do some leg work and find out more details.

Ciao a presto!
Lorenzo
